tool_description: Identifies, categorizes, and provides recommendations for handling shipping exceptions, delays, and anomalies in cargo tracking.

exception_type.description: Type of exception: delay, damage, loss, customs_hold, weather, mechanical

severity_level.description: Exception severity: minor, moderate, severe, critical

current_location.description: Current shipment location when exception occurred

customer_priority.description: Customer priority level: standard, premium, vip

auto_resolve.description: Whether to attempt automatic resolution where possible

error_messages: Invalid exception type: Use one of: delay, damage, loss, customs_hold, weather, mechanical.
Invalid severity level: Use one of: minor, moderate, severe, critical.
Shipment not found: The specified shipment_id does not exist or is not accessible.
Invalid customer priority: Use one of: standard, premium, vip.
Insufficient exception data: More details required to properly categorize and handle this exception type.
usage: Provide shipment_id, exception_type, and severity_level. Optionally include current_location, exception_details, customer_priority, and auto_resolve preference for comprehensive exception handling.

exception_id.description: Unique identifier for this exception case

recommended_actions.description: List of recommended actions to resolve the exception

estimated_resolution_time.description: Estimated time to resolve the exception

impact_assessment.description: Assessment of exception impact on delivery timeline

escalation_required.description: Whether this exception requires management escalation

alternative_solutions.description: Alternative solutions if primary recommendations fail
